intro: Memecylon stolzii, commonly known as the African starleaf, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, star-shaped leaves and clusters of white or pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forests and swamps. Memecylon stolzii is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
